@graph.rdfs:label: DimensionsImage
@graph.skos:definition: Type of solvent for thin-film preparation.

@graph.rdfs:label: RecipeFilePath
@graph.skos:definition: File path unique to a recipe

@graph.rdfs:label: DistanceFromSample
@graph.skos:definition: Distance of the detector from the sample.
The cummulative time a batch or sample was in exposure.

@graph.rdfs:label: Phase
@graph.skos:definition: Drying time in the evaporation process of film preparation.

@graph.rdfs:label: ExposureConditions
@graph.skos:definition: The specific environmental factors and durations to which samples are subjected to before characterization.

@graph.rdfs:label: Plating
@graph.skos:definition: Value describing the plating of an interdigitated comb

@graph.rdfs:label: Detector
skos:definition: A sensitive component that converts infrared radiation from the sample into an electrical signal for spectral analysis.
Sofwtare used in the instrument

@graph.rdfs:label: Energy
@graph.skos:definition: The energy of the incident beam.
The shunt resistance measured by a current voltage process

@graph.rdfs:label: temperature-coefficient-power
@graph.skos:definition: Reduction of some percent of PMP per degree Celsius. Rate at which power changes in reponse to a change in temperature.
The author of a recipe for a current voltage process
The current at max power measured by a current voltage process
The voltage at max power measured by a current voltage process
Measurements of a module taken at STC and 1000 W/m^2 irradiance

@graph.rdf:label: CurrentShortCircuit
skos:definition: Module short circuit current
Short-circuit current of the cell

@graph.skos:definition: The datetime when a current voltage process was executed

@graph.rdfs:label: ScanRate
@graph.skos:definition: Controls the rate at which the cantilever scans the sample area.

@graph.rdfs:label: AFMInstrumentModel
@graph.skos:definition: Model of the AFM instrument
The manufacturer of a solar simulator, i.e. 'Sinton Instruments'
The spational uniformity of a simulator

@graph.rdfs:label: TraceMaterial
@graph.skos:definition: Value describing the material that the finger traces are composed of
The temperature set point of the chamber.

@graph.rdfs:label: ToolCalibrationDate
@graph.skos:definition: Date that a tool is calibrated

@graph.rdfs:label: BeamSplitter
@graph.skos:definition: Multiple beamsplitter options are present such as KBr, XT-KBr, and Quartz

@graph.rdfs:label: BackgroundScans
@graph.skos:definition: measurement of the infrared radiation  for baseline correction.

@graph.rdfs:label: Dimple
@graph.skos:definition: Tipped structures resulting from ductile failure
The raw current voltage data generated by a current voltage process

@graph.rdfs:label: Gap
@graph.skos:definition: Value describing the space between each finger of an interdigitated comb

@graph.rdfs:label: ToolCalibrationResults
@graph.skos:definition: Results of a calibration of a tool

@graph.rdfs:label: ObservedModeTwoFailure
@graph.skos:definition: Failure of a material by shear stress parallel to the plane of the crack and perpendicular ot the crack front, ie: sliding
The fill factor measured by a current voltage process
The established intensity of a current voltage process

@graph.rdfs:label: cell-area
@graph.skos:definition: Total cell surface area.
A calibration setting that deteremines the irradiance level of a light source, typically determined by a reference cell

@graph.rdfs:label: RecipeCreatedDate
@graph.skos:definition: Date that a recipe is created

@graph.rdfs:label: GainParameters
@graph.skos:definition: Amplitude image from AFM instrument.

@graph.rdf:label: PhotovoltaicCellID
@graph.skos:definition: Identifier for the PV cell

@graph.rdfs:label: ToolCalibrationPerson
@graph.skos:definition: Person that calibrated a tool

@graph.rdfs:label: SampleDimension
@graph.skos:definition: Dimensions of a sample (if sample is solid)

@graph.rdfs:label: HotStage
@graph.skos:definition: hot stage for temperature dependent AFM experiments

@graph.rdfs:label: Masking
@graph.skos:definition: Value describing the masking of an interdigitated comb

@graph.rdfs:label: Width
skos:definition: Width of the sample
Width of module along shortest side

@graph.rdfs:label: PiezoelectricSensorLocation
@graph.skos:definition: Dimension of the fluoroelastomer film.

@graph.rdfs:label: cell-technology
@graph.skos:definition: Technology used on the cell level, i.e., cell architecture. E.g., Al-BSF, PERC, PERT, MWT, IBC, SHJ.

@graph.rdfs:label: SerialNumber
skos:definition: A unique identifier assigned to each individual instrument.
Serial numer of the instrument

@graph.rdfs:label: ModelName
@graph.skos:definition: Human-readable, English name of a model

@graph.rdfs:label: LightRange
@graph.skos:definition: Range of light levels that can be used

@graph.rdfs:label: Correction
@graph.skos:definition: The process of adjusting the spectral data to account for any instrumental factor like baseline correction.

@graph.rdfs:label: ObservedFailure
@graph.skos:definition: Perminant deformation caused by fracture

@graph.rdfs:label: cells-x
@graph.skos:definition: Number of cells in the shortest direction. E.g., 6, 8, 10
Area of an invididual cell within a module that a current voltage process is being performed on
The name of a solar simulator, i.e. 'Lab 1 Simulator'

@graph.rdfs:label: wafer-doping-polarity
@graph.skos:definition: Doping polarity of absorber. E.g., n-type or p-type.
Water content in the air divided by maximum water held at that temperature.

@graph.rdfs:label: ObservedModeThreeFailure
@graph.skos:definition: Failure of a material by shear stress parallel to the plane of the crack and parallel to the crack front, ie: tearing

@graph.rdfs:label: SampleSize
@graph.skos:definition: Size of samples that are within working range of an AFM instrument

@graph.dcterms:creator: SDLE Research Center
@graph.dcterms:description: MDS-Onto combines concepts from all different the different ontologies in Materials Data Science
@graph.dcterms:title: MDS-Onto
@graph.rdfs:label: MDS-Onto
PersonORCiD
@graph.skos:definition: Unique ID of a person

@graph.rdf:label: PhotovoltaicCell
@graph.skos:definition: PV cell that composes a module

@graph.rdfs:label: ModelID
@graph.skos:definition: Unique ID of a model

@graph.rdfs:label: module-packaging
@graph.skos:definition: The materials used for each layer of the solar panel excluding cell components. Either glass on glass (GG), glass with backsheet  GB), glass with transparent backsheet (GTB).

@graph.rdfs:label: Result
@graph.skos:definition: A consequence, effect, or outcome of a process

@graph.rdfs:label: AFMTip
@graph.skos:definition: A tip used in an AFM instrument that scans across a sample

rdfs:label: ToolModel
Model
skos:definition: Model of a tool
The specific version or type of instrument.

@graph.rdfs:label: PyrometryMonitor
@graph.skos:definition: In situ monitor of print
A UVF fluorescence pattern of a module

@graph.rdfs:label: RiverPattern
@graph.skos:definition: The pattern which results from fatigue crack growth

@graph.rdfs:label: number-busbars
@graph.skos:definition: Number of busbars present per cell.  Non-ribbon based technologies show none.

@graph.rdfs:label: RollRange
@graph.skos:definition: Range of roll motion

@graph.rdfs:label: ScanSpeed
@graph.skos:definition: The speed range in which the probe moves across a sample

@graph.rdfs:label: RecipeModifiedDate
@graph.skos:definition: Date that a recipe is modified

@graph.rdfs:label: EstimatedStressIntensityFactor
@graph.skos:definition: An estimation of the stress amplification at the crack tip

@graph.rdf:label: PhotovoltaicModule
@graph.skos:definition: A PV module, comprised of cells, for field deployment

@graph.rdfs:label: temperature-coefficient-voltage
@graph.skos:definition: Reduction of some percent of VOC per degree Celsius. Rate at which a voltage changes in reponse to a change in temperature.
The creation date for a current voltage process recipe

@graph.rdfs:label: InterdigitatedComb
@graph.skos:definition: Specimen subclass for an individual interdigitated comb

@graph.rdfs:label: IntegralGrain
@graph.skos:definition: Phase image from AFM instrument.

@graph.rdfs:label: number-parallel-strings
@graph.skos:definition: Number of series connections present in the module. 1 if all cells in series, 2 or more otherwise.

@graph.rdf:label: Longitude
@graph.skos:definition: East/west position of a point on the Earth, decimal format

@graph.rdfs:label: SetPoint
@graph.skos:definition: Cleaning process of the substrate.

@graph.rdfs:label: Recipe
@graph.skos:definition: A set of specifications that describes how a process is carried out

@graph.rdfs:label: Resolution
@graph.skos:definition: The ability of the spectrometer to distinguish between closely spaced spectral features i.e smallest difference in wavenumbers.
The standard testing condition load voltage of a sample being measured

@graph.rdfs:label: AFMInstrument
skos:definition: Piezoelectric sensor location of the AFM instrument.
An instrument that does atomic force microscopy (AFM)

@graph.skos:definition: The series resistance measured by a current voltage process
The amount of time between flash pulses

@graph.rdfs:label: cells-per-string
@graph.skos:definition: The number of cells in series together per individual string. E.g., 60, 72, etc.

@graph.rdf:label: Latitude
@graph.skos:definition: North/south position of a point on the Earth, decimal format

@graph.rdfs:label: ResultID
@graph.skos:definition: Unique ID of a result

@graph.rdf:label: PhotovoltaicChargeControllerID
@graph.skos:definition: Charge controller id.

@graph.rdfs:label: RecipeID
@graph.skos:definition: Unique ID for a recipe

@graph.rdfs:label: Manufacturer
skos:definition: A company or entity that designs, produces, and supplies the instrument and its accessories.
Manufacturer of the instrument

@graph.rdfs:label: Accessory
skos:definition: Accessory used for the measurement
An additional component or device such as crystal, gas cell, or sample holder, that enhances or modifies the functionality of the instrument.

@graph.rdfs:label: HotStageTemperature
@graph.skos:definition: temperature range of a hotstage in an AFM instrument

@graph.rdfs:label: FingerAmount
@graph.skos:definition: Value describing the number of fingers an interdigitated comb posseses

@graph.rdfs:label: wafer-crystallinity
@graph.skos:definition: Distinguishes whether the silicon wafer was manufactured as a single crystal, multiple crystals, or no crystal (amorphous); if not silicon, another value is used such as THIN FILM.

@graph.rdfs:label: nameplate-isc
@graph.skos:definition: Short-circuit current rated at STC
Theoretical efficency of a module

@graph.rdf:label: VoltageAtMaximumPower
skos:definition: DC voltage at the maximum power point under STC
DC voltage at the maximum power point of the cell

@graph.rdfs:label: nameplate-imp
@graph.skos:definition: Current at maximum power point rated at STC.

@graph.rdfs:label: ImageSequence
@graph.skos:definition: Running sequence of the image taken.
Number of cells in a module

@graph.rdfs:label: DetectorLength
@graph.skos:definition: Length of the detector.

@graph.rdf:label: PhotovoltaicSiteParameter
@graph.skos:definition: Parameter or property a PV site has
A sample used in a current voltage process

@graph.rdf:label: TrackingAlgorithm
@graph.skos:definition: If system is tracking, method used (truetracking, backtracking, diffuse tracking, etc)
Number of cells in a group of solar panels connected in series in a module
The step size of the voltage for a current voltage process

@graph.rdfs:label: WavelengthRange
@graph.skos:definition: The span of infrared wavelengths that the instrument can measure.
Power at refrence conditions

@graph.rdfs:label: LogFile
@graph.skos:definition: Contains log of the results.

@graph.rdf:label: PhotovoltaicRacking
@graph.skos:definition: How PV modules are arranged within the system

@graph.rdf:label: PhotovoltaicInverter
@graph.skos:definition: An inverter to convert DC to AC

@graph.rdfs:label: Absorbance
@graph.skos:definition: absorbance read by instrument

@graph.rdfs:label: RecipeAuthor
@graph.skos:definition: Person created a recipe

@graph.rdfs:label: Amplitude
@graph.skos:definition: Drying temperature in the evaporation process of film preparation.
The open circuit voltage measured by a current voltage process
The serial number of a solar simulator

rdfs:label: ReadingSpeed
readingTime

@graph.rdfs:label: nameplate-voc
@graph.skos:definition: Open-circuit voltage rated at STC
The short circuit current measured by a current voltage process

@graph.rdf:label: RackingType
@graph.skos:definition: Type of racking used (open, closed, roof, etc)

@graph.rdf:label: OutputCurrent
@graph.skos:definition: Charge controller output voltage [A-dc].

@graph.rdfs:label: Model
@graph.skos:definition: An algorithm that describes an underlying relationship between inputs and outputs
Material of the polymer encapsulant
The step count of the exposure.
Number of groups of solar panels connected in series in a module
A property of a PV module

@graph.rdfs:label: SampleScans
@graph.skos:definition: The process of collecting infrared spectral data from a sample by measuring the absorption at varoius wavelenghths.

@graph.rdfs:label: Sensitivity
skos:definition: Equipment sensitivity
The detector's ability to accurately measure and respond to small amounts of infrared radiation.

@graph.rdfs:label: model
@graph.skos:definition: Signifier of series or line of products.
Total area of the module that a current voltage process is being performed on

@graph.rdfs:label: InterdigitatedCombIdentifier
@graph.skos:definition: Identifier for each pattern of a board containing interdigitated combs

@graph.rdfs:label: Objective
@graph.skos:definition: Objective lens, ex: 5X, 20X

@graph.rdfs:label: cells-y
@graph.skos:definition: Number of cells in the longest direction. E.g., 10, 12, 20

@graph.rdfs:label: ModelFilePath
@graph.skos:definition: File path unique to a model

@graph.rdfs:label: interconnection-scheme
@graph.skos:definition: Method used to wire cells together. RIBBON, SHINGLED, WIRE

@graph.rdfs:label: CantileverForceConstant
@graph.skos:definition: the force constant of the cantilever; depends on the material

@graph.rdfs:label: nameplate-pmp
@graph.skos:definition: Maximum power rated at STC.

@graph.rdf:label: PowerDC

DC power produced by the cell

Term from the OrangeButton Taxonomy

@graph.skos:definition: Unique ID of a tool

@graph.skos:definition: Noise level of the Z sensor

@graph.skos:definition: A mark perpendicular to the direction of faitgue crack growth
